comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Op, it is a nice announcement thread, but you still need to add more write information about your services though you are offering Discord Services even at that, you still need to mare some description so that people will know what you are say or trying to do or informing the public. Like this I am only seen people discussions on discord and not about your services or is it me that did not see the screen well again. You are welcome but put more write up about your services so that people will hire to design their handles.

comments.author: Jeguilin
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on October 20, 2023, 02:25:01 PMOp, it is a nice announcement thread, but you still need to add more write information about your services though you are offering Discord Services even at that, you still need to mare some description so that people will know what you are say or trying to do or informing the public. Like this I am only seen people discussions on discord and not about your services or is it me that did not see the screen well again. You are welcome but put more write up about your services so that people will hire to design their handles.Thank you for your valuable feedback! We understand the importance of clarity when it comes to our services. As Discord moderators, we are here to enhance your server's experience and ensure a safe and engaging community. Here's a list of the key services we provide:Server DesignModeration and Bot ManagementAuto-RolesVoice ChannelsAnnouncement ChannelsText ChannelsLeveling SystemVerification System for SecurityBigger ServerUnique, Professional Discord Server DesignCustom Reaction Roles/Self-Assignable RolesThemed EmojisExtra Security Verification System for Server AccessPrivate Server Staff ChatLeveling and Invite Tracking SystemBeginner's Guide on How to UseSupport After Order CompletionServer Stats and AnalyticsCustom Embed PostsNotifications for Video Posts and Live StreamsDeleted Message/Image LogsGiveaway ChannelPolls and SurveysMember Welcome and Farewell MessagesCustom Bot CommandsÂ  ("...and more")These services aim to make your Discord server a thriving, well-moderated, and engaging community. Feel free to reach out to us for more information or to discuss how we can assist you further. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we look forward to working with you to design and manage your server effectively.Best regards, Jeguilin!

comments.author: Jeguilin
comments.body: Provide free consultations up to 21 of april
